Row.Text: -1 Happiness and Gold per Population in Cities founded by you. +100% Happiness maintenance for Specialists. +0.5 Culture and Production for every 1 excess Happiness in Cities founded by you.

[LIST][LI][B]-1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness[/B] and [B][icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold[/B] per Population in Cities founded by you.[LI][B]+100% [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness[/B] maintenance for [B]Specialists[/B].[LI][B]+0.5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture[/B] and [B][icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production[/B] for every [B]1[/B] excess [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] [B]Happiness[/B] in [B]Cities[/B] founded by you.[/LIST]
[B]Mexico[/B] was a [B]Revolutionary Republic[/B], like the state [B]Cromwell[/B] led.
[B]France[/B] was a [B]Revolutionary Republic[/B], like the state [B]Cromwell[/B] led.
[B]Rome[/B] was often led by [B]Military Dictators[/B], like [B]Cromwell[/B].
[B]Oliver Cromwell[/B] created a [B]Republic[/B], a form of government common in [B]Greece[/B].
